# datadog_datastore_item (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about an existing Datadog datastore item.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `datastore_id` (String) The unique identifier of the datastore containing the item.
- `item_key` (String) The primary key value that identifies the item to retrieve.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the item was first created.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `modified_at` (String) Timestamp when the item was last modified.
- `org_id` (Number) The ID of the organization that owns this item.
- `signature` (String) A unique signature identifying this item version.
- `store_id` (String) The unique identifier of the datastore containing this item.
- `value` (Map of String) The data content (as key-value pairs) of the datastore item.
